name: Chronicles of Mike
description: This is gonna be a Terran Campaign about a Marine named Mike who has stolen some Prototype Items from the Dominion and was then exiled on a Jungle Planet. Very WIP basic storyline. Map 1 is in development. Version 0.07 Released Fixed all the transmissions and some of the unit errors. Started the Protoss Temple section. Expect Part 2 in the next map update.
author: _ForgeUser4387210
